channel.title: Book Review on Alex Bachuk
channel.description: Recent content in Book Review on Alex Bachuk

item.title: WordPress Application development book review and free giveaway
item.description: TL;DR: Packtpub was kind enough to give me 2 digital copies to give away to my readers. Please leave a comment below, add a sentence or two what app you’re working on or why you’d like to win this book. I’ll pick 2 winners on July 12th. WordPress has come along way from being just a blogging platform to becoming a full-featured CMS site. It is now even being used as a platform for web and mobile applications.

item.title: Book review: Backbone.js patterns and best practices
item.description: I developed a few large scale apps with Backbone.js and always looking to improve the way I’m developing these apps, there is always something new (patterns, plugins, frameworks, libraries, etc). So I picked up this book and decided to give it a try. I have teamed up with Packt Publishing to organize a giveaway of the book. Keep reading to find out how you can be one of the Lucky Winners.
